text: I nɛma Yerusalɛn taan yɛngɛ feen misaala mayita waxatin naxan yi, na na ɲan, i yi i xunsɛxɛne dɔxɔde kedenna gan taani. I yi a dɔxɔ firinden tongo, i yi a bɔnbɔ i ya silanfanna ra taan nabilinni. I yi a dɔxɔde saxanden naxuya ayi foyeni, bayo n tan Isirayila kaane sagatanma nɛn n ma silanfanna ra.
